## Context and motivation

-   [Time-to-event and longitudinal data]{style="color:green;"} are fundamental in health-related data
-   Clinical studies usually collect the [time until the occurrence]{style="color:green;"} of specific events and [repeated measurements of biomarkers]{style="color:green;"} over time
-   A significant feature is its [temporal]{style="color:green;"} dimension, which enables the generation of [dynamic predictions]{style="color:green;"}
-   These predictions have demonstrated utility in [precision medicine]{style="color:green;"}
